Body:
t = Template(
    """
        <%%page cache_dir='%s' cache_type='dbm'/>
        <%%!
            callcount = [0]
        %%>
        <%%def name="foo()" cached="True">
            this is foo
            <%%
            callcount[0] += 1
            %%>
        </%%def>

        ${foo()}
        ${foo()}
        ${foo()}
        callcount: ${callcount}
"""
     % module_base)
m = self._install_mock_cache(t)
assert result_lines(t.render()) == ['this is foo', 'this is foo',
    'this is foo', 'callcount: [1]']
eq_(m.kwargs, {'dir': module_base, 'type': 'dbm'})
